description: He is a barber. He seems sadistic, and likes to give people `the trim` if something goes wrong. He is often the source of information for the D.S.A.. However, he is also the leader of Black Scissors, a mercenary black market group who has been contracted by Kurokawa`s old police captain to kill Kurokawa (mostly because Kurokawa is holding a DVD with embarrassing pictures about the captain in order to obtain ammunition).
name: Hasami no Mugi-chan
